sentences.sContent: My poor brother used to get thrashed for all kinds of minor offences.
sentences.sCn: 我那可怜的哥哥过去常常因为各种各样的小错而挨打。

synos.tran: 打谷；逆风浪行进；踢水动作

remMethod.val: th+rash(鲁莽的) → 一时气急， 鞭打别人 → 鞭打

words.tran: 打谷机；脱粒机；鸫鸟之类；长尾鲨鱼

trans.tranCn: 打(谷), (用棍、鞭等)痛打, 打败, 使逆行, 胜过, 使颠簸, 推敲
trans.tranOther: to beat someone violently, especially in order to punish them
